game_description: This demo is part of the main version of the Intubation training app for medical students and educators, healthcare professionals, and patients, which you can learn and practice the process of Intubation step by step in the future through the full app. The intubation process can be used in airway protection and control of the airway such as: • general anaesthesia • congenital malformations and diseases of the upper airway • perinatal resuscitation • various forms of acute respiratory distress *** This app is a demo and please don't use it in any way to educate and practice on real patients *** If you are interested in using the main educational version of this app, please support us and share your comments with us here.
review_1: The visual content and details in this educational game are fantastic! The graphics are captivating and the attention to detail is commendable. The visuals not only make the game visually appealing but also effectively convey educational content. Great job by the developers in creating an engaging and informative visual experience for learning!
review_2: I really appreciate this educational app and its potential for further development. I look forward to seeing more scenarios and features from the creators in the future.
review_3: I really like where this is going, and hope there will be a full version soon.
review_4: This app is awesome for training Demo, It's look like real situation. I 'm student and we don't have like this app for training with this great simulation in our university or personal education. you have nice graphic too with quest limits that I know. Of course you have to improve steps for complete this trauma training, Also I want to say: I can't wait for more new training scenarios and updates.
review_5: I love the look of the app and would love to be able to accomplish more on it, but even with a large room scale I had difficulty reaching some instruments in order to attempt an intubation.
